name: Fact Fight
description:
Welcome to Fact Fight

You are a little journalist armed with an endless supply of factual information. You are being bombarded by alternative facts from all sides. Expose politicians using the truth, then photograph them.

Collect 3 snaps of any politician, then get busy on social media to bring them down!

Controls:

WASD: Move the journalist.

Move the mouse to aim.

Right-click: Throw some facts.

Shift + right-click: Throw a fact bomb. (Bigly. Tremendous.)

Left-click: Snap a photo. (Only works on politicians that have been exposed by facts.)

Hold Q: Social media time! (Hold for 5 seconds.)
